item.title: A Prayer Plan for Making Prayer a Habit
item.description: Why? Let me begin by explaining why I developed this plan. If I’m honest, my prayer time was embarrassing. I told people I would pray for them only to pray for them once and promptly forget about them entirely. When I was praying, I was constantly fighting a wandering mind and sleep-inducing boredom as I would use the same phrases over-and-over: “God, please be with Martha in her life.”
